Memberships
Membership includes unlimited greens fees (tee times permitting), annual trail fee, unlimited use of practice facility and aqua driving range, taxes and a 10% discount on all pro shop merchandise.
Single Membership
$2,300 per year
Couples Membership
$3,000 per year
Request Membership Information

About the Course
A Hidden Gem in Punta Gorda
Blue Heron Pines, a Sun Homes 55+ community in Punta Gorda, offers an 18-hole, par-60 executive golf course within the community. With a length of 3,180 yards from the back tees and 2,362 yards from the forward tees, it allows players to get out and play in less time and aggravation. The course is semi-private, offering both memberships at very reasonable rates and pay-as-you-go daily fees. Tee times can be booked a week in advance. Residents enjoy resort-style amenities and activities, this close-knit community is a great place to live.
